TopicTitle: Togglable Heat Shield for B9, SPP etc

Articles.Content:
Hello good forums peeps

I have a suggestion/request:

The B9 Aerospace Addon, as we all know and love, brilliantly allows the user to toggle heat shielding on/off on curtain parts (RCS modules for example) and changes their textures accordingly - ACE!. I'd love to see this functionality extended to the B9 aircraft parts (wings, fuselage, cockpits etc) not to mention the stock SP parts. Of course, B9 plane parts already have ablative shielding permanently, but being able to toggle this on or off both visually and functionally in the VAB/SPH would be shweeeeet!!!

Spanx then
